en.bdb: One Oankar, the primal energy, realized through the grace of divine preceptor
One Oankar, the primal energy, realized through the grace of divine preceptor
Ekankar, the Lors second to none, created gurmukh (to liberate the world).
That Oankar assuming forms has become manifest.
By extension (and combination) of the five elements this world has been created.
The four mines of life and four speeches ( para, pasyanti, madhyama, vaikhari) have been generated.

verse.gurmukhi: kudriq Agm Apwru AMqu n pwieAw[
verse.unicode: ਕੁਦਰਤਿ ਅਗਮ ਅਪਾਰੁ ਅੰਤੁ ਨ ਪਾਇਆ।

en.bdb: His feats of amusements are inaccessible and limitless; their extremes are unattainable.

transliteration.english: kudharat agam apaar a(n)t na paiaa|
transliteration.hindi: कुदरति अगम अपारु अंतु न पाइआ।
transliteration.en: kudharat agam apaar a(n)t na paiaa|
transliteration.hi: कुदरति अगम अपारु अंतु न पाइआ।
transliteration.ipa: kʊd̪ərət̪ əGəm əpɑr əŋt̪ nə pɑɪɑ.
transliteration.ur: کُدرت اگم اپار اںت ن پاایا۔

en.bdb: The name of that creator is Truth and He is ever immersed in Truth.
The best among the eightyfour lakhs of species of life
Souls wander fruitlessly in the eighty-four lakhs of species of life.
The rare human body has been obtained owing to virtuous actions.
Moving on greatest path of the Guru orientated, the self has lost the ego.
Maintaining the discipline of the holy congregation has come to fall at the feet (of the Guru).
Gurmukhs have adopted the name of the Lord, the charity, the ablution and truthful conduct steadfastly.
The man has merged his consciousness in the Word and has accepted the will of the Lord.
Gurmukh is the guest ,
Gurmukh taught by the Guru is well trained and knowledgeable.
He understands that he has come to the assembly of this world as a guest.
He eats and drinks what is bestowed by the Lord.

verse.gurmukhi: krY n grbu gumwxu hsY hswieAw[
verse.unicode: ਕਰੈ ਨ ਗਰਬੁ ਗੁਮਾਣੁ ਹਸੈ ਹਸਾਇਆ।

en.bdb: Gurmukh is not arrogant and feels happy in the happiness given by the Lord.

transliteration.english: karai na garab gumaan hasai hasaiaa|
transliteration.hindi: करै न गरबु गुमाणु हसै हसाइआ।
transliteration.en: karai na garab gumaan hasai hasaiaa|
transliteration.hi: करै न गरबु गुमाणु हसै हसाइआ।
transliteration.ipa: kəræ nə Gərəb Gʊmɑɳ həsæ həsɑɪɑ.
transliteration.ur: کرَے ن گرب گُماݨ هسَے هساایا۔

en.bdb: Only that guest gets accepted in the court of the Lord who has lived here as a good guest.
He moves from here silently and makes the whole assembly wonders struck (because others feel very difficult to leave this world).
Method of moving around ,
Gurmukh knows this world as a place of rest for a few days.
Here with the help of wealth many types of sports and feats are enacted.
In this very world, for gurmukhs incessant rain of nectar goes on pouring.
On the tune of flute (the unstruck melody) they go on enjoying the delight of the assembly.
Well-trained and knowledgeable persons sing Majh and Malhar musical measures here i.e. they enjoy the present.

verse.gurmukhi: haumY grbu invwir min vis AwxIAY[
verse.unicode: ਹਉਮੈ ਗਰਬੁ ਨਿਵਾਰਿ ਮਨਿ ਵਸਿ ਆਣੀਐ।

en.bdb: They lose their ego and control their minds.

transliteration.english: haumai garab nivaar man vas aaneeaai|
transliteration.hindi: हउमै गरबु निवारि मनि वसि आणीऐ।
transliteration.en: haumai garab nivaar man vas aaneeaai|
transliteration.hi: हउमै गरबु निवारि मनि वसि आणीऐ।
transliteration.ipa: hoʊmæ Gərəb nɪʋɑr mən ʋəs əɑɳiæ.
transliteration.ur: هامَے گرب نوار من وسِ آݨیِاَے۔

en.bdb: Contemplating the Word, the Gurmukh identifies the truth.
Moving teachnique - living an inn ,
A wayfarer, on the way halted in an inn.
Then moved forward on the told path.

verse.gurmukhi: nwih prweI qwiq n iciq rhisAw[
verse.unicode: ਨਾਹਿ ਪਰਾਈ ਤਾਤਿ ਨ ਚਿਤਿ ਰਹਸਿਆ।

en.bdb: He neither got envious with anyone nor did he get infatuated by any.

transliteration.english: naeh paraiee taat na chit rahasiaa|
transliteration.hindi: नाहि पराई ताति न चिति रहसिआ।
transliteration.en: naeh paraiee taat na chit rahasiaa|
transliteration.hi: नाहि पराई ताति न चिति रहसिआ।
transliteration.ipa: nɑh pərɑei t̪ɑt̪ nə t͡ʃɪt̪ rəhəsɪəɑ.
transliteration.ur: ناه پراای تات ن چت رهسِآ۔

verse.gurmukhi: muey n puCY jwiq ivvwih n hisAw[
verse.unicode: ਮੁਏ ਨ ਪੁਛੈ ਜਾਤਿ ਵਿਵਾਹਿ ਨ ਹਸਿਆ।

en.bdb: He neither asked the caste (identity) of any dying person nor he felt any delight witnessing the marriage ceremonies etc.

transliteration.english: mue na puchhai jaat vivaeh na hasiaa|
transliteration.hindi: मुए न पुछै जाति विवाहि न हसिआ।
transliteration.en: mue na puchhai jaat vivaeh na hasiaa|
transliteration.hi: मुए न पुछै जाति विवाहि न हसिआ।
transliteration.ipa: mʊee nə pʊɕæ d͡ʒɑt̪ ʋɪʋɑh nə həsɪəɑ.
transliteration.ur: مُاے ن پُچھَے جات وواه ن هسآ۔

verse.gurmukhi: dwqw krY ju dwiq n BuKw qisAw[
verse.unicode: ਦਾਤਾ ਕਰੈ ਜੁ ਦਾਤਿ ਨ ਭੁਖਾ ਤਸਿਆ।

en.bdb: He happily accepted gifts of the Lord and never remained hungry or thirsty.

transliteration.english: dhaataa karai ju dhaat na bhukhaa tasiaa|
transliteration.hindi: दाता करै जु दाति न भुखा तसिआ।
transliteration.en: dhaataa karai ju dhaat na bhukhaa tasiaa|
transliteration.hi: दाता करै जु दाति न भुखा तसिआ।
transliteration.ipa: d̪ɑt̪ɑ kəræ d͡ʒ d̪ɑt̪ nə ɓʊkʰɑ t̪əsɪəɑ.
transliteration.ur: داتا کرَے جُ دات ن بھُکھا تسآ۔

en.bdb: The lotus face of the gurmukh always remains in blossom due to continuous remembrance of the Lord.
Moving teachnique - living an inn
Lamps are lighted in the night of divali festival;
Stars of different variety appear in the sky;

verse.gurmukhi: PulW dI bwgwiq cuix cuix cwlIAin[
verse.unicode: ਫੁਲਾਂ ਦੀ ਬਾਗਾਤਿ ਚੁਣਿ ਚੁਣਿ ਚਾਲੀਅਨਿ।

en.bdb: In the gardens the flowers are there which are selectively plucked;

transliteration.english: fulaa(n) dhee baagaat chun chun chaaleean|
transliteration.hindi: फुलाँ दी बागाति चुणि चुणि चालीअनि।
transliteration.en: fulaa(n) dhee baagaat chun chun chaaleean|
transliteration.hi: फुलाँ दी बागाति चुणि चुणि चालीअनि।
transliteration.ipa: fʊlɑⁿ d̪i bɑGɑt̪ t͡ʃʊɳ t͡ʃʊɳ t͡ʃɑliənɪ.
transliteration.ur: پھُلاں دیِ باگات چُݨ چُݨ چالیِان۔

en.bdb: The pilgrims going to pilgrimage centres are also seen.
The imaginary habitats have been seen coming into being and vanishing.

verse.gurmukhi: gurmuiK suK Pl dwiq sbid smHwlIAin ]6]
verse.unicode: ਗੁਰਮੁਖਿ ਸੁਖ ਫਲ ਦਾਤਿ ਸਬਦਿ ਸਮ੍ਹਾਲੀਅਨਿ ॥੬॥

en.bdb: All these are momentary, but the gurmukhs with the help of the Word nourish the gift of the pleasure fruit.

transliteration.english: gurmukh sukh fal dhaat sabadh samhaaleean ||6||
transliteration.hindi: गुरमुखि सुख फल दाति सबदि सम्हालीअनि ॥६॥
transliteration.en: gurmukh sukh fal dhaat sabadh samhaaleean ||6||
transliteration.hi: गुरमुखि सुख फल दाति सबदि सम्हालीअनि ॥६॥
transliteration.ipa: Gʊrəmʊkʰ sʊkʰ fəl d̪ɑt̪ səbəd̪ səmʰɑliən.6.
transliteration.ur: گُرمکھ سُکھ پھل دات سبد سمھالیِان ۔۔۶۔۔

en.bdb: Way of the world - parent's home -
The gurmukh who have received well with the Guru's teachings have got their minds enlightened.
They have understood that the world is like a parental home; one has to go one day from here and hence all their doubts have been removed.
They are unattached amid hopes and remain charged with the knowledge.
They spread message of the Word in accordance with the conduct of the holy congregation.
The idea that they are servants of the servants of the Lord has got deeply rooted in the wisdom of the gurmukhs.
Be they anywhere in the country or abroad they remember God with every inhalation and exhalation of breath.
Technique of life - , ,
As in a boat per-chance many persons unknown to each other meet, likewise the creatures in the world meet each other.
The world is such as if ruling a kingdom and enjoying the pleasures in a dream.

verse.gurmukhi: kdy hrKu kdy sogu qrvr CwieAw[
verse.unicode: ਕਦੇ ਹਰਖੁ ਕਦੇ ਸੋਗੁ ਤਰਵਰ ਛਾਇਆ।

en.bdb: Here happiness and sufferings are like shade of the tree.

transliteration.english: kadhe harakh kadhe sog taravar chhaiaa|
transliteration.hindi: कदे हरखु कदे सोगु तरवर छाइआ।
transliteration.en: kadhe harakh kadhe sog taravar chhaiaa|
transliteration.hi: कदे हरखु कदे सोगु तरवर छाइआ।
transliteration.ipa: kəd̪e hərəkʰ kəd̪e sɔG t̪ərəʋər ɕɑɪɑ.
transliteration.ur: کدے هرکھ کدے سوگ ترور چھاایا۔

verse.gurmukhi: ktY haumY rogu n Awpu gxwieAw[
verse.unicode: ਕਟੈ ਹਉਮੈ ਰੋਗੁ ਨ ਆਪੁ ਗਣਾਇਆ।

en.bdb: Here in fact he has decimated the malady of ego who has not made himself to be noticed.

transliteration.english: kaTai haumai rog na aap ganaiaa|
transliteration.hindi: कटै हउमै रोगु न आपु गणाइआ।
transliteration.en: kaTai haumai rog na aap ganaiaa|
transliteration.hi: कटै हउमै रोगु न आपु गणाइआ।
transliteration.ipa: kəʈæ hoʊmæ rɔG nə əɑp Gəɳɑɪɑ.
transliteration.ur: کٹَے هامَے روگ ن آپ گݨاایا۔

verse.gurmukhi: Gr hI AMdir jogu gurmuiK pwieAw[
verse.unicode: ਘਰ ਹੀ ਅੰਦਰਿ ਜੋਗੁ ਗੁਰਮੁਖਿ ਪਾਇਆ।

en.bdb: Becoming gurmukh, individual even being at one's home attains union (with the Lord).

transliteration.english: ghar hee a(n)dhar jog gurmukh paiaa|
transliteration.hindi: घर ही अंदरि जोगु गुरमुखि पाइआ।
transliteration.en: ghar hee a(n)dhar jog gurmukh paiaa|
transliteration.hi: घर ही अंदरि जोगु गुरमुखि पाइआ।
transliteration.ipa: Gʰər hi əŋd̪ər d͡ʒɔG Gʊrəmʊkʰ pɑɪɑ.
transliteration.ur: گھر هیِ اںدر جوگ گُرمکھ پاایا۔

en.bdb: The Guru has made him understand that destiny cannot be averted (hence one without being worried should go on doing one's works).
Method in the world - desirelessness -
Gurmukhs have learnt the technique of life in the holy congregation.

verse.gurmukhi: cyiq bsMqu surMgu sB rMg mwixAw[
verse.unicode: ਚੇਤਿ ਬਸੰਤੁ ਸੁਰੰਗੁ ਸਭ ਰੰਗ ਮਾਣਿਆ।

en.bdb: They have consciously enjoyed the delight of the spring season of life.

transliteration.english: chet basa(n)t sura(n)g sabh ra(n)g maaniaa|
transliteration.hindi: चेति बसंतु सुरंगु सभ रंग माणिआ।
transliteration.en: chet basa(n)t sura(n)g sabh ra(n)g maaniaa|
transliteration.hi: चेति बसंतु सुरंगु सभ रंग माणिआ।
transliteration.ipa: t͡ʃet̪ bəsəŋt̪ sʊrəŋG səɓ rəŋG mɑɳɪəɑ.
transliteration.ur: چےت بسںت سُرںگ سبھ رںگ ماݨآ۔

en.bdb: They are elated like the water of rainy season (Savan) but still they (gurmukhs) have made water of hopes and desires go down and downward.

verse.gurmukhi: sjx mylu su FMg coj ivfwixAw[
verse.unicode: ਸਜਣ ਮੇਲੁ ਸੁ ਢੰਗ ਚੋਜ ਵਿਡਾਣਿਆ।

en.bdb: Meeting with such persons is wonderfully delightful.

transliteration.english: sajan melu su dda(n)g choj viddaaniaa|
transliteration.hindi: सजण मेलु सु ढंग चोज विडाणिआ।
transliteration.en: sajan melu su dda(n)g choj viddaaniaa|
transliteration.hi: सजण मेलु सु ढंग चोज विडाणिआ।
transliteration.ipa: səd͡ʒəɳ mel s ʈəŋG t͡ʃɔd͡ʒ ʋɪɖɑɳɪəɑ.
transliteration.ur: سجݨ مےل سُ ڈھںگ چوج وڈاݨآ۔

en.bdb: They way of gurmukhs is devoid of mire and is accepted in the court of the Lord.
A meeting through the wisdom of the Guru is obstruction free, true and delightful.
Success of the birth

verse.gurmukhi: gurmuiK sPl jnMmu jg ivic AwieAw[
verse.unicode: ਗੁਰਮੁਖਿ ਸਫਲ ਜਨੰਮੁ ਜਗ ਵਿਚਿ ਆਇਆ।

en.bdb: Blest is the birth of a gurmukh and his coming to this world.

transliteration.english: gurmukh safal jana(n)m jag vich aaiaa|
transliteration.hindi: गुरमुखि सफल जनंमु जग विचि आइआ।
transliteration.en: gurmukh safal jana(n)m jag vich aaiaa|
transliteration.hi: गुरमुखि सफल जनंमु जग विचि आइआ।
transliteration.ipa: Gʊrəmʊkʰ səfəl d͡ʒənəŋm d͡ʒəG ʋɪt͡ʃ əɑɪɑ.
transliteration.ur: گُرمکھ سپھل جنںم جگ وچ آایا۔

en.bdb: In accordance with the wisdom of the Guru he deletes his ego and accomplishes the (virtuous) actions.

verse.gurmukhi: Bwau Bgiq kir kMm suK Pl pwieAw[
verse.unicode: ਭਾਉ ਭਗਤਿ ਕਰਿ ਕੰਮ ਸੁਖ ਫਲ ਪਾਇਆ।

en.bdb: He works controlled by his love for work and loving devotion, and receives the pleasure fruit (of life).

transliteration.english: bhaau bhagat kar ka(n)m sukh fal paiaa|
transliteration.hindi: भाउ भगति करि कंम सुख फल पाइआ।
transliteration.en: bhaau bhagat kar ka(n)m sukh fal paiaa|
transliteration.hi: भाउ भगति करि कंम सुख फल पाइआ।
transliteration.ipa: ɓɑo ɓəGət̪ kər kəŋm sʊkʰ fəl pɑɪɑ.
transliteration.ur: بھاا بھگت کر کںم سُکھ پھل پاایا۔

en.bdb: The inaccessible teachings of the Guru he adopts in his heart.
Keeping of the flag of forbearance and dharma high, becomes his innate nature.

verse.gurmukhi: shY n dUK shMmu Bwxw BwieAw ]10]
verse.unicode: ਸਹੈ ਨ ਦੂਖ ਸਹੰਮੁ ਭਾਣਾ ਭਾਇਆ ॥੧੦॥

en.bdb: He bows before the will of the Lord and never suffers any fear or sorrow.

transliteration.english: sahai na dhookh saha(n)m bhaanaa bhaiaa ||10||
transliteration.hindi: सहै न दूख सहंमु भाणा भाइआ ॥१०॥
transliteration.en: sahai na dhookh saha(n)m bhaanaa bhaiaa ||10||
transliteration.hi: सहै न दूख सहंमु भाणा भाइआ ॥१०॥
transliteration.ipa: səhæ nə d̪ukʰ səhəŋm ɓɑɳɑ ɓɑɪɑ.1ə0.
transliteration.ur: سهَے ن دُوکھ سهںم بھاݨا بھاایا ۔۔۱۰۔۔

en.bdb: Gurmukh-mind
Gurmukhs know (very well) that human birth is a rare opportunity.
That is why they cultivate love for holy congregation and enjoy all delights.
They speak after merging their consciousness in the Word.
They become bodiless while living in body and identify the truth.

verse.gurmukhi: duibDw Ehu n eyhu ieku pCwxdy[
verse.unicode: ਦੁਬਿਧਾ ਓਹੁ ਨ ਏਹੁ ਇਕੁ ਪਛਾਣਦੇ।

en.bdb: They do not have this or that dilemma and know only one Lord.

transliteration.english: dhubidhaa oh na eh ik pachhaanadhe|
transliteration.hindi: दुबिधा ओहु न एहु इकु पछाणदे।
transliteration.en: dhubidhaa oh na eh ik pachhaanadhe|
transliteration.hi: दुबिधा ओहु न एहु इकु पछाणदे।
transliteration.ipa: d̪ʊbɪt̪ɑ oəh nə eeh eɪk pəɕɑɳəd̪e.
transliteration.ur: دُبدھا اوهُ ن اےهُ اک پچھاݨدے۔

verse.gurmukhi: cwir idhwVy Qyhu mn ivic Awxdy ]11]
verse.unicode: ਚਾਰਿ ਦਿਹਾੜੇ ਥੇਹੁ ਮਨ ਵਿਚਿ ਆਣਦੇ ॥੧੧॥

en.bdb: They know in their heart of heart that within a short period this world is going to become a mound (of earth) and hence they do not develop any attachment with it.

transliteration.english: chaar dhihaaRe theh man vich aanadhe ||11||
transliteration.hindi: चारि दिहाड़े थेहु मन विचि आणदे ॥११॥
transliteration.en: chaar dhihaaRe theh man vich aanadhe ||11||
transliteration.hi: चारि दिहाड़े थेहु मन विचि आणदे ॥११॥
transliteration.ipa: t͡ʃɑr d̪ɪhɑɽe t̪ʰeh mən ʋɪt͡ʃ əɑɳəd̪e.1ə1.
transliteration.ur: چار دهاڑے تھےهُ من وچ آݨدے ۔۔۱۱۔۔

en.bdb: Reality of gurmukh
Rarely comes a benevolent gurmukh who serves others.

verse.gurmukhi: gurmuiK suK Plu pwie Awpu gvwieAw[
verse.unicode: ਗੁਰਮੁਖਿ ਸੁਖ ਫਲੁ ਪਾਇ ਆਪੁ ਗਵਾਇਆ।

en.bdb: The Gurmukh abandons ego and receives the fruit of delight.

transliteration.english: gurmukh sukh fal pai aap gavaiaa|
transliteration.hindi: गुरमुखि सुख फलु पाइ आपु गवाइआ।
transliteration.en: gurmukh sukh fal pai aap gavaiaa|
transliteration.hi: गुरमुखि सुख फलु पाइ आपु गवाइआ।
transliteration.ipa: Gʊrəmʊkʰ sʊkʰ fəl pɑeɪ əɑp Gəʋɑɪɑ.
transliteration.ur: گُرمکھ سُکھ پھل پاا آپ گواایا۔

en.bdb: Only the gurmukh tells the story of the (grandeur of ) Word to the disciples (of the Guru) and never claims to tell something as his own.
Deeply pondering over the Word, a gurmukh practices truth in his life,

verse.gurmukhi: scu irdY muih scu sic suhwieAw[
verse.unicode: ਸਚੁ ਰਿਦੈ ਮੁਹਿ ਸਚੁ ਸਚਿ ਸੁਹਾਇਆ।

en.bdb: He likes the truth, which resides in his heart as well as speech.

transliteration.english: sach ridhai muh sach sach suhaiaa|
transliteration.hindi: सचु रिदै मुहि सचु सचि सुहाइआ।
transliteration.en: sach ridhai muh sach sach suhaiaa|
transliteration.hi: सचु रिदै मुहि सचु सचि सुहाइआ।
transliteration.ipa: sət͡ʃ rɪd̪æ mʊh sət͡ʃ sət͡ʃ sʊhɑɪɑ.
transliteration.ur: سچ ردَے مُه سچ سچ سُهاایا۔

en.bdb: Such a gurmukh not only spruces his own life he rather gets the whole world across.
Conduct of the gurmukh
The Gurmukh losing his ego and identifies his self.
The Gurmukh enters his innate nature through truth and contentment.

verse.gurmukhi: gurmuiK DIrju Drmu dieAw suKu mwixAw[
verse.unicode: ਗੁਰਮੁਖਿ ਧੀਰਜੁ ਧਰਮੁ ਦਇਆ ਸੁਖੁ ਮਾਣਿਆ।

en.bdb: The Gurmukh alone enjoys the true delights of forbearance, dharma and compassion.

transliteration.english: gurmukh dheeraj dharam dhiaa sukh maaniaa|
transliteration.hindi: गुरमुखि धीरजु धरमु दइआ सुखु माणिआ।
transliteration.en: gurmukh dheeraj dharam dhiaa sukh maaniaa|
transliteration.hi: गुरमुखि धीरजु धरमु दइआ सुखु माणिआ।
transliteration.ipa: Gʊrəmʊkʰ t̪irəd͡ʒ t̪ərəm d̪ɪɑ sʊkʰ mɑɳɪəɑ.
transliteration.ur: گُرمکھ دھیِرج دھرم دایا سُکھ ماݨآ۔

en.bdb: Gurmukhs very well understand the importance of the words first, and only then they speak them out.
Though being powerful, the gurmukhs always consider themselves weak and humble.
Because the gurmukhs are polite, they receive respects in the court of the Lord.
The Gurmukhs always accept the divine order
Spending this life fruitfully the Gurmukh goes to the other world.

verse.gurmukhi: scI drgh jwie scw ipV milAw[
verse.unicode: ਸਚੀ ਦਰਗਹ ਜਾਇ ਸਚਾ ਪਿੜ ਮਲਿਆ।

en.bdb: There in the true court (of the lord) they get their true place.

transliteration.english: sachee dharageh jai sachaa piR maliaa|
transliteration.hindi: सची दरगह जाइ सचा पिड़ मलिआ।
transliteration.en: sachee dharageh jai sachaa piR maliaa|
transliteration.hi: सची दरगह जाइ सचा पिड़ मलिआ।
transliteration.ipa: sət͡ʃi d̪ərəGəh d͡ʒɑeɪ sət͡ʃɑ pɪɽ məlɪəɑ.
transliteration.ur: سچیِ درگه جاا سچا پڑ ملآ۔

en.bdb: Repast of the Gurmukh is love and their delight is devoid of flirtatiousness.

verse.gurmukhi: gurmuiK inhclu icqu n hlY hilAw[
verse.unicode: ਗੁਰਮੁਖਿ ਨਿਹਚਲੁ ਚਿਤੁ ਨ ਹਲੈ ਹਲਿਆ।

en.bdb: The Gurmukh has a tranquil heart and remains steadfast even in ups and downs.

transliteration.english: gurmukh nihachal chit na halai haliaa|
transliteration.hindi: गुरमुखि निहचलु चितु न हलै हलिआ।
transliteration.en: gurmukh nihachal chit na halai haliaa|
transliteration.hi: गुरमुखि निहचलु चितु न हलै हलिआ।
transliteration.ipa: Gʊrəmʊkʰ nɪhət͡ʃəl t͡ʃɪt̪ nə həlæ həlɪəɑ.
transliteration.ur: گُرمکھ نهچل چت ن هلَے هلآ۔

verse.gurmukhi: gurmuiK scu Alwau BlI hUM BilAw[
verse.unicode: ਗੁਰਮੁਖਿ ਸਚੁ ਅਲਾਉ ਭਲੀ ਹੂੰ ਭਲਿਆ।

en.bdb: The Gurmukh speaks truth and good of the good.

transliteration.english: gurmukh sach alaau bhalee hoo(n) bhaliaa|
transliteration.hindi: गुरमुखि सचु अलाउ भली हूँ भलिआ।
transliteration.en: gurmukh sach alaau bhalee hoo(n) bhaliaa|
transliteration.hi: गुरमुखि सचु अलाउ भली हूँ भलिआ।
transliteration.ipa: Gʊrəmʊkʰ sət͡ʃ əlɑo ɓəli huŋ ɓəlɪəɑ.
transliteration.ur: گُرمکھ سچ الاا بھلیِ هُوں بھلآ۔

en.bdb: Only Gurmukhs are called to the court of the Lord and they come to the world only when the Lord sends them.
Virtue of a Gurmukh
Gurmukh accomplishes the intractable and hence is called sadhu.
Gurmukh has such wisdom, which is competent to separate water from milk. This is why he is called wise.
The devotion of gurmukh is loving devotion.
Since the gurmukhs attain divine knowledge, they are called knowledgeable ones (jnanis).
Gurmukhs have the wisdom fully stamped and marked by the Word.

verse.gurmukhi: gurmuiK pauVI piq iprmu rsu mwxIAY ]15]
verse.unicode: ਗੁਰਮੁਖਿ ਪਉੜੀ ਪਤਿ ਪਿਰਮੁ ਰਸੁ ਮਾਣੀਐ ॥੧੫॥

en.bdb: Climbing the stairs of high regards, the gurmukh enjoys the delight of love of the beloved Lord.

transliteration.english: gurmukh pauRee pat piram ras maaneeaai ||15||
transliteration.hindi: गुरमुखि पउड़ी पति पिरमु रसु माणीऐ ॥१५॥
transliteration.en: gurmukh pauRee pat piram ras maaneeaai ||15||
transliteration.hi: गुरमुखि पउड़ी पति पिरमु रसु माणीऐ ॥१५॥
transliteration.ipa: Gʊrəmʊkʰ poʊɽi pət̪ pɪrəm rəs mɑɳiæ.1ə5.
transliteration.ur: گُرمکھ پاڑیِ پت پرم رس ماݨیِاَے ۔۔۱۵۔۔

en.bdb: Gains from a gurmukh
The true name of the creator Lord is received from the gurmukhs,
Amidst the gurmukhs the Oankar Word is remembered.

verse.gurmukhi: gurmuiK sbdu vIcwru sdw ilv lweIAY[
verse.unicode: ਗੁਰਮੁਖਿ ਸਬਦੁ ਵੀਚਾਰੁ ਸਦਾ ਲਿਵ ਲਾਈਐ।

en.bdb: Amid the gurmukhs the word is pondered upon and the consciousness is merged in it,

transliteration.english: gurmukh sabadh veechaar sadhaa liv laieeaai|
transliteration.hindi: गुरमुखि सबदु वीचारु सदा लिव लाईऐ।
transliteration.en: gurmukh sabadh veechaar sadhaa liv laieeaai|
transliteration.hi: गुरमुखि सबदु वीचारु सदा लिव लाईऐ।
transliteration.ipa: Gʊrəmʊkʰ səbəd̪ ʋit͡ʃɑr səd̪ɑ lɪʋ lɑeiæ.
transliteration.ur: گُرمکھ سبد ویِچار سدا لو لاایاَے۔

en.bdb: Living the truthful life of the gurmukhs, the truth is accomplished in life.
Gurmukh is that door of liberation through which one automatically enters his innate nature (the divine self).
He base of name (of the Lord) is attained from gurmukhs and one does not repent in the end.
Gains from a gurmukh
Touching the philosopher's stone in the form of a gurmukh one himself becomes the philosophers stone.
By the glimpse only of the gurmukh, all evil passions become untouchable.
Meditating upon the Lord amid the gurmukhs one loses duality.

verse.gurmukhi: gurmuiK prDn rUp inMd n goeIAY[
verse.unicode: ਗੁਰਮੁਖਿ ਪਰਧਨ ਰੂਪ ਨਿੰਦ ਨ ਗੋਈਐ।

en.bdb: In the company of the gurmukhs neither the wealth and physical beauty of others is seen nor is backbiting committed.

transliteration.english: gurmukh paradhan roop ni(n)dh na goieeaai|
transliteration.hindi: गुरमुखि परधन रूप निंद न गोईऐ।
transliteration.en: gurmukh paradhan roop ni(n)dh na goieeaai|
transliteration.hi: गुरमुखि परधन रूप निंद न गोईऐ।
transliteration.ipa: Gʊrəmʊkʰ pərət̪ən rup nɪŋd̪ nə Gɔeiæ.
transliteration.ur: گُرمکھ پردھن رُوپ نںد ن گوایاَے۔

en.bdb: In the company of gurmukhs only nectar-name in the form of Word is churned and the essence is acquired.

verse.gurmukhi: gurmuiK hsdw jwie AMq n roeIAY ]17]
verse.unicode: ਗੁਰਮੁਖਿ ਹਸਦਾ ਜਾਇ ਅੰਤ ਨ ਰੋਈਐ ॥੧੭॥

en.bdb: In the company of gurmukhs the jiva (self) at last becomes happy and does not wail and weep.

transliteration.english: gurmukh hasadhaa jai a(n)t na roieeaai ||17||
transliteration.hindi: गुरमुखि हसदा जाइ अंत न रोईऐ ॥१७॥
transliteration.en: gurmukh hasadhaa jai a(n)t na roieeaai ||17||
transliteration.hi: गुरमुखि हसदा जाइ अंत न रोईऐ ॥१७॥
transliteration.ipa: Gʊrəmʊkʰ həsəd̪ɑ d͡ʒɑeɪ əŋt̪ nə rɔeiæ.1ə7.
transliteration.ur: گُرمکھ هسدا جاا اںت ن روایاَے ۔۔۱۷۔۔

en.bdb: Nature and form of gurmukh
As a knowledgeable person, the gurmukh imparts knowledge to the world.
Losing their ego, the gurmukhs purify their inner-self.

verse.gurmukhi: gurmuiK squ sMqoKu n kwmu kroDIAY[
verse.unicode: ਗੁਰਮੁਖਿ ਸਤੁ ਸੰਤੋਖੁ ਨ ਕਾਮੁ ਕਰੋਧੀਐ।

en.bdb: Gurmukhs adopt truth and contentment and do not indulge in lust and anger.

transliteration.english: gurmukh sat sa(n)tokh na kaam karodheeaai|
transliteration.hindi: गुरमुखि सतु संतोखु न कामु करोधीऐ।
transliteration.en: gurmukh sat sa(n)tokh na kaam karodheeaai|
transliteration.hi: गुरमुखि सतु संतोखु न कामु करोधीऐ।
transliteration.ipa: Gʊrəmʊkʰ sət̪ səŋt̪ɔkʰ nə kɑm kərɔt̪iæ.
transliteration.ur: گُرمکھ ست سںتوکھ ن کام کرودھیِاَے۔

verse.gurmukhi: gurmuiK hY inrvYru n vYr ivroDIAY[
verse.unicode: ਗੁਰਮੁਖਿ ਹੈ ਨਿਰਵੈਰੁ ਨ ਵੈਰ ਵਿਰੋਧੀਐ।

en.bdb: Gurmukhs have no enmity and opposition towards anyone.

transliteration.english: gurmukh hai niravair na vair virodheeaai|
transliteration.hindi: गुरमुखि है निरवैरु न वैर विरोधीऐ।
transliteration.en: gurmukh hai niravair na vair virodheeaai|
transliteration.hi: गुरमुखि है निरवैरु न वैर विरोधीऐ।
transliteration.ipa: Gʊrəmʊkʰ hæ nɪrəʋær nə ʋær ʋɪrɔt̪iæ.
transliteration.ur: گُرمکھ هَے نروَےر ن وَےر ورودھیِاَے۔

en.bdb: Preaching to all the four varnas, gurmukhs merge in equipoise.
Blest is the mother of a gurmukh who has given birth to him and the gurmukh is the best among warriors.
Carefree gurmukh
Gurmukh eulogises the wondrous Lord in the form.
Gurmukhs have true kingdom of God's praises.
Gurmukhs have armour of truth which they have been gifted by the Lord.
For gurmukhs only the beautiful highway of truth has been prepared.
Their wisdom is unfathomable and to get to it one gets perplexed.
Gurmukh is carefree in the world but not so towards the Lord.
Serious and tranquil gurmukh

verse.gurmukhi: gurmuiK pUrw qolu n qolix qolIAY[
verse.unicode: ਗੁਰਮੁਖਿ ਪੂਰਾ ਤੋਲੁ ਨ ਤੋਲਣਿ ਤੋਲੀਐ।

en.bdb: Gurmukh is perfect; he cannot be weighed on any scale.

transliteration.english: gurmukh pooraa tol na tolan toleeaai|
transliteration.hindi: गुरमुखि पूरा तोलु न तोलणि तोलीऐ।
transliteration.en: gurmukh pooraa tol na tolan toleeaai|
transliteration.hi: गुरमुखि पूरा तोलु न तोलणि तोलीऐ।
transliteration.ipa: Gʊrəmʊkʰ purɑ t̪ɔl nə t̪ɔləɳ t̪ɔliæ.
transliteration.ur: گُرمکھ پُورا تول ن تولݨ تولیِاَے۔

verse.gurmukhi: gurmuiK pUrw bol n bolix bolIAY[
verse.unicode: ਗੁਰਮੁਖਿ ਪੂਰਾ ਬੋਲ ਨ ਬੋਲਣਿ ਬੋਲੀਐ।

en.bdb: Every word by gurmukh comes to be true and perfect and nothing can be said about him.

transliteration.english: gurmukh pooraa bol na bolan boleeaai|
transliteration.hindi: गुरमुखि पूरा बोल न बोलणि बोलीऐ।
transliteration.en: gurmukh pooraa bol na bolan boleeaai|
transliteration.hi: गुरमुखि पूरा बोल न बोलणि बोलीऐ।
transliteration.ipa: Gʊrəmʊkʰ purɑ bɔl nə bɔləɳ bɔliæ.
transliteration.ur: گُرمکھ پُورا بول ن بولݨ بولیِاَے۔

verse.gurmukhi: gurmuiK miq Afol n folix folIAY[
verse.unicode: ਗੁਰਮੁਖਿ ਮਤਿ ਅਡੋਲ ਨ ਡੋਲਣਿ ਡੋਲੀਐ।

en.bdb: The wisdom of gurmukhs is stable one and does not get destabilised even if done so.

transliteration.english: gurmukh mat addol na ddolan ddoleeaai|
transliteration.hindi: गुरमुखि मति अडोल न डोलणि डोलीऐ।
transliteration.en: gurmukh mat addol na ddolan ddoleeaai|
transliteration.hi: गुरमुखि मति अडोल न डोलणि डोलीऐ।
transliteration.ipa: Gʊrəmʊkʰ mət̪ əɖɔl nə ɖɔləɳ ɖɔliæ.
transliteration.ur: گُرمکھ مت اڈول ن ڈولݨ ڈولیِاَے۔

verse.gurmukhi: gurmuiK iprm Amolu n molix molIAY[
verse.unicode: ਗੁਰਮੁਖਿ ਪਿਰਮ ਅਮੋਲੁ ਨ ਮੋਲਣਿ ਮੋਲੀਐ।

en.bdb: The love of gurmukhs is invaluable and it cannot be purchased at any cost.

transliteration.english: gurmukh piram amol na molan moleeaai|
transliteration.hindi: गुरमुखि पिरम अमोलु न मोलणि मोलीऐ।
transliteration.en: gurmukh piram amol na molan moleeaai|
transliteration.hi: गुरमुखि पिरम अमोलु न मोलणि मोलीऐ।
transliteration.ipa: Gʊrəmʊkʰ pɪrəm əmɔl nə mɔləɳ mɔliæ.
transliteration.ur: گُرمکھ پرم امول ن مولݨ مولیِاَے۔

verse.gurmukhi: gurmuiK pMQ inrolu n rolix rolIAY[
verse.unicode: ਗੁਰਮੁਖਿ ਪੰਥ ਨਿਰੋਲੁ ਨ ਰੋਲਣਿ ਰੋਲੀਐ।

en.bdb: The way of gurmukh is clear and distinct; it cannot be subsumed and dissipated by any one.

transliteration.english: gurmukh pa(n)th nirol na rolan roleeaai|
transliteration.hindi: गुरमुखि पंथ निरोलु न रोलणि रोलीऐ।
transliteration.en: gurmukh pa(n)th nirol na rolan roleeaai|
transliteration.hi: गुरमुखि पंथ निरोलु न रोलणि रोलीऐ।
transliteration.ipa: Gʊrəmʊkʰ pəŋt̪ʰ nɪrɔl nə rɔləɳ rɔliæ.
transliteration.ur: گُرمکھ پںتھ نرول ن رولݨ رولیِاَے۔

verse.gurmukhi: gurmuiK sbdu Alolu pI AMimRqu JolIAY ]20]
verse.unicode: ਗੁਰਮੁਖਿ ਸਬਦੁ ਅਲੋਲੁ ਪੀ ਅੰਮ੍ਰਿਤੁ ਝੋਲੀਐ ॥੨੦॥

en.bdb: The words of gurmukhs are steadfast; along with them one quaffs nectar by deleting passions and carnal desires.

transliteration.english: gurmukh sabadh alol pee a(n)mrit jholeeaai ||20||
transliteration.hindi: गुरमुखि सबदु अलोलु पी अंमृतु झोलीऐ ॥२०॥
transliteration.en: gurmukh sabadh alol pee a(n)mrit jholeeaai ||20||
transliteration.hi: गुरमुखि सबदु अलोलु पी अंमृतु झोलीऐ ॥२०॥
transliteration.ipa: Gʊrəmʊkʰ səbəd̪ əlɔl pi əŋmɪɹət̪ ɖ͡ʐɔliæ.2ə0.
transliteration.ur: گُرمکھ سبد الول پیِ اںمرت جھولیِاَے ۔۔۲۰۔۔

en.bdb: Gurmukhs remain dormant in their self

verse.gurmukhi: gurmuiK suKPl pwie sB Pl pwieAw[
verse.unicode: ਗੁਰਮੁਖਿ ਸੁਖਫਲ ਪਾਇ ਸਭ ਫਲ ਪਾਇਆ।

en.bdb: By attaining pleasure-fruit gurmukhs have received all the fruits.

transliteration.english: gurmukh sukhafal pai sabh fal paiaa|
transliteration.hindi: गुरमुखि सुखफल पाइ सभ फल पाइआ।
transliteration.en: gurmukh sukhafal pai sabh fal paiaa|
transliteration.hi: गुरमुखि सुखफल पाइ सभ फल पाइआ।
transliteration.ipa: Gʊrəmʊkʰ sʊkʰəfəl pɑeɪ səɓ fəl pɑɪɑ.
transliteration.ur: گُرمکھ سُکھپھل پاا سبھ پھل پاایا۔

verse.gurmukhi: rMgu surMgu cVHwie sB rMg lwieAw[
verse.unicode: ਰੰਗੁ ਸੁਰੰਗੁ ਚੜ੍ਹਾਇ ਸਭ ਰੰਗ ਲਾਇਆ।

en.bdb: Putting on the beautiful colour of the Lord they have enjoyed the delight of all the colours.

transliteration.english: ra(n)g sura(n)g chaRhai sabh ra(n)g laiaa|
transliteration.hindi: रंगु सुरंगु चड़्हाइ सभ रंग लाइआ।
transliteration.en: ra(n)g sura(n)g chaRhai sabh ra(n)g laiaa|
transliteration.hi: रंगु सुरंगु चड़्हाइ सभ रंग लाइआ।
transliteration.ipa: rəŋG sʊrəŋG t͡ʃəɽʰɑeɪ səɓ rəŋG lɑɪɑ.
transliteration.ur: رںگ سُرںگ چڑھاا سبھ رںگ لاایا۔

en.bdb: Merging in the fragrance (of devotion) they make everyone fragrant.
They have satiated with the delight of nectar and now they feel as if they have had all the taste.
Merging their consciousness in the Word they have become one with the unstruck melody.

verse.gurmukhi: inj Gir inhcl jwie n dhidis DwieAw ]21]19]
verse.unicode: ਨਿਜ ਘਰਿ ਨਿਹਚਲ ਜਾਇ ਨ ਦਹਦਿਸਿ ਧਾਇਆ ॥੨੧॥੧੯॥

en.bdb: Now they get stabilised in their inner self and their mind does not now wonder in all the ten directions.

transliteration.english: nij ghar nihachal jai na dhahadhis dhaiaa ||21||19||
transliteration.hindi: निज घरि निहचल जाइ न दहदिसि धाइआ ॥२१॥१९॥
transliteration.en: nij ghar nihachal jai na dhahadhis dhaiaa ||21||19||
transliteration.hi: निज घरि निहचल जाइ न दहदिसि धाइआ ॥२१॥१९॥
transliteration.ipa: nɪd͡ʒ Gʰər nɪhət͡ʃəl d͡ʒɑeɪ nə d̪əhəd̪ɪs t̪ɑɪɑ.2ə1.1ə9.
transliteration.ur: نِج گھر نهچل جاا ن دهدِس دھاایا ۔۔۲۱۔۔۱۹۔۔
